name: api_rendering_Light

properties.name: areaSize
properties.description: The size of the area light.

properties.name: bakingOutput
properties.description: This property describes the output of the last Global Illumination bake.

properties.name: bounceIntensity
properties.description: The multiplier that defines the strength of the bounce lighting.

properties.name: boundingSphereOverride
properties.description: Bounding sphere used to override the regular light bounding sphere during culling.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Specifies the color emitted by the light.

properties.name: colorTemperature
properties.description: The color temperature of the light. Correlated Color Temperature (abbreviated as CCT) is multiplied with the color filter when calculating the final color of a light source. The color temperature of the electromagnetic radiation emitted from an ideal black body is defined as its surface temperature in Kelvin. White is 6500K according to the D65 standard. A candle light is 1800K and a soft warm light bulb is 2700K. If you want to use colorTemperature, GraphicsSettings.lightsUseLinearIntensity and Light.useColorTemperature has to be enabled. Additional resources: GraphicsSettings.lightsUseLinearIntensity, GraphicsSettings.useColorTemperature.

properties.name: commandBufferCount
properties.description: Number of command buffers set up on this light (Read Only).

properties.name: cookie
properties.description: The cookie texture projected by the light.

properties.name: cookieSize2D
properties.description: The size of a directional light's cookie.

properties.name: cullingMask
properties.description: This is used to light certain objects in the Scene selectively.

properties.name: dilatedRange
properties.description: The maximum distance the emitted light might travel from the position of the light. This property does not apply to directional lights.

properties.name: enableSpotReflector
properties.description: Wether a Spot Light should simulate having a reflector.

properties.name: flare
properties.description: The flare asset to use for this light.

properties.name: forceVisible
properties.description: Force a light to be visible even if outside the view frustum.

properties.name: innerSpotAngle
properties.description: The angle of the spot light's inner cone in degrees.

properties.name: intensity
properties.description: The Intensity of a light is multiplied with the Light color.

properties.name: layerShadowCullDistances
properties.description: Per-light, per-layer shadow culling distances. Directional lights only.

properties.name: lightmapBakeType
properties.description: This property describes what part of a light's contribution can be baked (Editor only).

properties.name: lightShadowCasterMode
properties.description: Allows you to override the global Shadowmask Mode per light. Only use this with render pipelines that can handle per light Shadowmask modes. Incompatible with the legacy renderers.

properties.name: lightUnit
properties.description: The unit Light.intensity should be displayed in.
